patthana22.4:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:4.2: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.4:5.1: (Naakusale dve, naabyākate dve. Paṭhamaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, dutiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, tatiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, sabbattha nava pañhā.)
patthana22.4:6.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.4:7.1: Nakusalaṃ naahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:7.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.4:8.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:8.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.4:9.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:9.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.4:10.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:11.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana22.4:12.1: Naakusalaṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana22.4:13.1: Naabyākataṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:14.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
